comments.raw_text: GL layers on Android are currently failing in part because of invalid framebuffers. The attached patch expands the GL debug mode to help fix that. It's not yet ready to check in, at least it should only print stuff in MOZ_GL_DEBUG_VERBOSE mode.
comments.text:
Created attachment 529692
framebuffers debugging

GL layers on Android are currently failing in part because of invalid framebuffers. The attached patch expands the GL debug mode to help fix that. It's not yet ready to check in, at least it should only print stuff in MOZ_GL_DEBUG_VERBOSE mode.
